Method Detail

computePopupBounds

protected java.awt.Rectangle computePopupBounds(int px,
                                                int py,
                                                int pw,
                                                int ph)
Computes the bounds for the Popup in Piccolo if a PMouseEvent has been received. Otherwise, it uses the default algorithm for placing the popup.

Overrides:
computePopupBounds in class javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicComboPopup
Parameters:
px - corresponds to the x coordinate of the popup
py - corresponds to the y coordinate of the popup
pw - corresponds to the width of the popup
ph - corresponds to the height of the popup
Returns:
The bounds for the PopupMenu
